meanings.definition: A woman who holds a joint tenancy with another person.
meanings.sent1: The jointresses shared ownership of the house.
meanings.sent2: The jointresses inherited the property together.
meanings.sent3: The jointresses joked about being housemates for life.
meanings.sent4: Their bond as jointresses was as strong as the foundation of the house.
meanings.sent5: The jointresses signed the agreement with smiles of partnership.

meanings.sent1: We invited the jointresses to the party.
meanings.sent2: The jointresses attended the event in style.
meanings.sent3: The jointresses formed a club for joint ownership enthusiasts.
meanings.sent4: The jointresses stood out in their matching outfits.
meanings.sent5: The jointresses' unity was evident in their synchronized movements.
